params/cfengine-core.json.comment: Sample parameters to check out the CFEngine core into /tmp/cfengine-core

params/cfengine-core-runas-tzz.json.comment: Same as cfengine-core.json, but runs as user 'tzz'

params/cfengine-copbl.json.comment: Sample parameters to check out the CFEngine standard library (COPBL) into /tmp/cfengine-copbl

params/thrift-lib-perl.json.comment: Sample parameters to check out the Thrift Perl libraries into /tmp/thrift-lib-perl
